title: Birth of Muhammad ﷺ
description: Born in Mecca during the Year of the Elephant.

title: Death of Amina
description: Mother of the Prophet ﷺ passed away.

title: Under Care of Abu Talib
description: After Abdul Muttalib’s death, Prophet was raised by Abu Talib.

title: Marriage to Khadijah
description: Married Khadijah bint Khuwaylid RA at age 25.

title: First Revelation
description: Angel Jibril reveals first verses of the Qur’an at Cave Hira.

title: Public Preaching Begins
description: Prophet ﷺ openly calls people to Islam.

title: Migration to Abyssinia
description: First Muslim migration for protection under Christian king.

title: Revelation: Surah Al-Fatiha
description: The Opening chapter is revealed, essential in prayer.

title: Boycott of Hashim Clan
description: Quraysh isolate Prophet ﷺ and followers in valley.

title: Year of Sorrow
description: Khadijah RA and Abu Talib both pass away.

title: Journey to Ta'if
description: Prophet ﷺ seeks support in Ta’if, is rejected and attacked.

title: First Pledge of Aqabah
description: Men from Yathrib pledge allegiance to Islam.

title: Hijrah to Medina
description: Migration and foundation of Islamic community.

title: Change of Qiblah
description: Direction of prayer changed from Jerusalem to Mecca.

title: Battle of Badr
description: First major battle; Muslims achieve victory.

title: Fasting in Ramadan Instituted
description: Revelation commands fasting in the month of Ramadan.

title: Battle of Uhud
description: Second major battle, Muslims experience loss.

title: Battle of the Trench
description: Muslims defend Medina using trench strategy.

title: Treaty of Hudaybiyyah
description: Peace treaty signed between Muslims and Quraysh.

title: Revelation: Victory Surah
description: Surah al-Fath (Victory) is revealed.

title: First Umrah
description: Prophet ﷺ performs Umrah as part of treaty agreement.

title: Conquest of Mecca
description: Mecca is peacefully entered by Muslims.

title: Destruction of Idols
description: Prophet ﷺ removes idols from the Ka'bah.

title: Delegations Year
description: Many tribes enter Islam during this year.

title: Farewell Hajj
description: Prophet ﷺ performs his only and final Hajj.

title: Last Sermon
description: Delivered during the Farewell Hajj at Arafat.

title: Passing of Prophet ﷺ
description: Prophet ﷺ dies in Medina.
